author: glenn
msg: Fix rare case where processor counter was not decremented.

author: costin
msg: When the thread ends, remove it from the list of active threads.

author: billbarker
msg: Fixing JavaDocs and logging messages to reflect the correct 4.x syntax (instead of the 3.3 syntax).

author: billbarker
msg: Adding the 'maxKeepAliveRequests' attribute to the Connector.  The code in the Protocol and Processor has been there for a very long time.
I'd be +1 to changing the 4.x and 4.x Connectors to (like the 3.3 Connector) attempt to pass all configuration attributes to the Protocol, and let the Protocol decide if it care about it.
